title: I hope urf doesn't come out too quick
body: I will be away for the weekend after ascension which I know will be Urf. Im sad, i can only hope doom bots or something returns. But since Riot promised that every gamemode would return at least 1 and 1/2 months consecutively, I know that its due to come on that weekend. I only hope that everyone else who gets to play it has fun.
